data.title: Shielded by Faith
data.description: Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this general. On a 5+ that mortal wound is negated.

data.title: Consummate Commander
data.description: If this general is on the battlefield at the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. On a 4+ you receive 1 extra command point.

data.title: Cunning Strategist
data.description: After set-up is complete, but before the battle begins, D3 friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units can move up to 5``

data.title: Zealous Crusader
data.description: You can re-roll charge rolls for this general.

data.title: Staunch Defender
data.description: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units wholly within 9 `` of this general if that STORMCAST ETERNAL unit has not made a charge move in the same turn

data.title: Champion of the Realms
data.description: Pick one of this general’s melee weapons. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon.
